description: This Dart source file implements the front-end UI for a Tic Tac Toe game using Flutter. It defines the main application widget, game state management, UI components for the game board, scorecards, status indicators, and controls for resetting the game and scores.

classes.name: TicTacToeApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, setting up the MaterialApp theme and home page.

classes.name: GamePage
classes.description: Stateful widget managing the game logic, UI, and interactions of the Tic Tac Toe game.

classes.name: _GamePageState
classes.description: State class for GamePage, contains game state, logic, and UI building methods.

classes.name: _BoardCell
classes.description: Widget representing each cell on the game board with animations and state handling.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the application, runs the TicTacToeApp widget.

methods.name: TicTacToeApp.<init>
methods.description: Constructor initializing the root widget of the app.

methods.name: TicTacToeApp.build
methods.description: Build method returning the MaterialApp with theme and home page.

methods.name: GamePage.<init>
methods.description: Constructor for the game page widget.

methods.name: _GamePageState.resetBoard
methods.description: Resets the game board for a new round.

methods.name: _GamePageState.handleTap
methods.description: Handles user tap on a cell; updates game state and checks for a winner/draw.

methods.name: _GamePageState._checkWinner
methods.description: Checks all winning combinations to determine if there's a winner.

methods.name: _GamePageState._buildStatusBar
methods.description: Builds the status bar showing current turn, winner, or draw.

methods.name: _GamePageState._buildBoard
methods.description: Builds the game board grid with interactive cells.

methods.name: _GamePageState._buildControls
methods.description: Builds control buttons for starting a new game or resetting scores.

methods.name: _BoardCell.<init>
methods.description: Constructor for individual board cell widget.

methods.name: _BoardCellState.<init>
methods.description: Initializes animation controller for cell pop effect.

methods.name: _BoardCellState.didUpdateWidget
methods.description: Triggers scale animation on value update to animate move effect.

methods.name: _BoardCellState.build
methods.description: Builds animated and tappable cell with styling and highlight for winning line.
